column17:
Product Description

Impart the freshness of lavender to your bedroom decor with this beautifully designed quilt. Snuggle underneath it with a book in hand and while away the time. This quilt is ideal for use during the onset of winter or during the rainy season. It is quite easy to clean and can be used on a regular basis.
